definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: But too much dreaming sinks and drowns.
sentences.chinese: 但過分的夢想能使人滅頂下沉。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of ethnic Greeks were uprooted from Ionian coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬的種族希臘人在愛奧尼亞海岸遭到滅頂之災。

sentences.english: De Lesseps failed spectacularly. It was a complete disaster.
sentences.chinese: 他經歷了慘痛的失敗，這是一場滅頂之災。

sentences.english: How can they suffer complete annihilation of Lei Feng, the couple were the pain.
sentences.chinese: 又哪有雷鋒滅頂之苦，夫妻分別之痛。

sentences.english: A remote village in Kaohsiung was feared fully sudmerged by flood-created lake burst.
sentences.chinese: 高雄縣甲仙鄉小林村甚至有恐全村慘遭滅頂。

sentences.english: Faith is our destroyer. Faith has brought us doom.
sentences.chinese: 信仰是我們的掘墓人，帶來滅頂之災。

definition: no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
after the calamity, renewed life (idiom); new lease of life

Feast at Hongmen/(fig.) banquet set up with the aim of murdering a guest/refers to a famous episode in 206 BC when future Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] escaped attempted murder by his rival Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3]
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to repeat errors/to continue blundering/to make continuous mistakes
to charge and break through enemy lines
